name: Chemnovatic Salicylic Acid
description: Chemnovatic Salicylic Acid is a white or almost white crystalline powder with a melting point of 158.0 - 161.0Â°C. This acid is commonly found in fruits and vegetables and is used as a medicine. Its major application is in chemical manufacturing.

Synonyms: 2-carboxyphenol, 2-hydroxybenzenecarboxylic acid, 2-hydroxybenzoic acid, o-Carboxyphenol, o-Hydroxybenzoic acid, Phenol-2-Carboxylic Acid
